column2: an A.M. Eatery////Visit one: I had a Chile Verde Benny
column3: and Chilaquiles Benedict they were amazing! I am not complaining at all they were top notch
column4: but when a lovely woman sat next to me and ordered a trio of pancakes
column5: I was jealous. Theresa was sweet enough to get me one on the house
column6: to calm down the green eyed monster within me. She was really sweet.
